entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
